description: Walk the original Golf Course on Blackheath, with local historian Neil Rhind MBE. The golf course of Blackheath was established 1766 and was the first golf course outside of Scotland. Golf continued to be played on the Heath until 1920s.

factsheet.heading: Walk the original Blackheath Golf Course
paragraphs: Neil Rhind MBE, President of the Blackheath Society, will lead this historic walk over the old course played by the Blackheath Society of Goffers from the mid-18th century to about 1914 or thereabouts. Golf House in Goffers Road was used as HQ until the merger, in 1923, with Eltham.

images.title: William Innes (1719-795), Captain of the Blackheath Society of Goffers in 1778.

name: Walk the original Blackheath Golf Course
